title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: Five lots of papar crypto collectibles up for grabs:LOT 1: Bitcoin Whitepaper mini from CoinCenter.org , 5x3.5 inchesLOT 2: Monero puzzle book: Mnemonic Treasure Hunt 300+ pagesLOT 3: 2x Bitcoin Magazine Fall 2021: The El Salvador issueLOT 4: 3x Bitcoin Whitepaper hardcover book, 8.5x11 inchesLOT 5: 4x Wallstreet Journal / Financial Times newspapers bundle-WSJ Jan 29 2021: GameStop/Wall Street Bets-WSJ Jan 28 2021: GameStop-WSJ Feb 02 2021: GameStop/Silver/Robinhood-WSJ Feb 09 2021: Tesla/BTC-FT Weekend Feb 13/14 2021: Elon/Tesla/BTC -FT Weekend Jan 30/31 2021: Wall Street Bets/GameStop-FT Feb 09 2021: Tesla/BTC**Lots 3,4, and 5 will work on a LIFO system as seen in previous multi-lot multi-item auctions**STARTING BID PER LOT PER LOT: 0.0002BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT PER LOT: 0.0001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: JANUARY 24rd, 2023, 14:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preference
